anatomical_definition: length from the tip of the snout to the posterior-most part of trunk that meets the caudal fin
length from the tip of the snout to the posterior-most part of trunk that meets the caudal fin
code_definition: distance between the left-right sides  of a bounding box around the head+eye and trunk

trait: eye area using pixels of mask

trait: head area using pixels of mask
code_definition: area of the head based on the mask that segments the head, including the eye

length from the anterior-most (left-most) part of the head to the posterior-most (right-most) part of the head

anatomical_definition: length from the anterior-most (left-most) part of the eye to the anterior-most (left-most)part of the head

code_definition: distance between the left edge of the head bounding box and the eye bounding box

trait: head depth through midline of the eye
anatomical_definition: length from the dorsal-most (top) part of the head to the ventral-most (bottom) part of the head through the midline of the eye
code_definition: length from the dorsal-most (top) part of the head to the ventral-most (bottom) part of the head through landmark #18

anatomical_definition: length across the eye along the anterior-posterior (left-right) axis
